text: PLEASE KNOW THE FOLLOWING DISORDERS Anxiety Disorders Mood Disorders = Generalized Anxiety Disorder * Major Depressive Disorder * Panic Disorder * Persistent Depressive Disorder (Dysthymic = Specific Phobia Disorder) * Social Anxiety Disorder * Bipolar Disorder + Agoraphobia * Cyclothymic Disorder Trauma-related Disorders Psychotic Disorders * Posttraumatic Stress Disorder * Schizophrenia Obsessive-Compulsive and Related Disorders = Obsessive-Compulsive Disorder * Hoarding Disorder
